Class ModifyProductController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.ModifyProductController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable
    public class ModifyProductController
extends java.lang.Object
implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
    ModifyProduct Controller class - controls logic for Modify Product page of the application.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void initialize​(java.net.URL url, java.util.ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      This method Initializes the ModifyProduct page - brings selected product data from Main Screen - sets both tables to default values and parts.
      (package private) void onActionModifyProductAdd​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method moves selected part from parts table to products table and produces an alert if no part is selected.
      (package private) void onActionModifyProductCancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method cancels any data entered to Modify Product screen and tables - returns to main page.
      (package private) void onActionModifyProductDelete​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method removes selected part from Product Table.
      (package private) void onActionModifyProductSave​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method checks for empty or invalid fields before saving part and returning to the Main page.
      (package private) void onActionModifyProductSearch​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method searches the Part Table for parts by name or ID# - then highlights found part.
